column1: 1158|11:58 AM|Nguyen shrugged. He pointed at the clock on the dashboard that said 11:58 AM. "Maybe they're heading to lunch." He smiled
column2:
as he returned his focus to the road and the vehicles in front of him.
Noack mumbled

column1: 1158|11.58|And when you go down the steps
column2: it's always 11.58 on the morning of September ninth

column1: 1158|Two minutes before the clock struck noon|Two minutes before the clock struck noon
column2: the savage baron was on the platform to inspect the preparation for the frightful ceremony of mid-day. The block was laid forth-the hideous minister of vengeance
column4: with the flaming glaive in his hand
column5: was ready. The baron tried the edge of the blade with his finger
column6: and asked the dreadful swordsman if his hand was sure? A nod was the reply of the man of blood.
